patient_info: Nephritis,Sinusitis,High-frequency sensorineural hearing impairment,Microscopic hematuria,Abnormal urinary color,Macroscopic hematuria
golden_diagnosis: Alport syndrome, X-linked,Alport syndrome 2, autosomal recessive,Alport syndrome 3, autosomal dominant,Alport 综合征/Alport syndrome/Alport syndrome,Alport 综合征/Alport syndrome/Alport syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
1. Lupus nephritis - a rare autoimmune kidney disease that can cause nephritis, sinusitis, and high-frequency sensorineural hearing impairment.
2. Vasculitis - an inflammatory condition that can affect the blood vessels and cause nephritis, sinusitis, and hearing loss.
3. Chronic fatigue syndrome - a complex condition that can involve the kidneys, heart, and nervous system, leading to nephritis and sinusitis.
4. Polymyositis - another autoimmune disease that can affect the kidneys, heart, and nervous system, causing nephritis and sinusitis.
5. Lyme disease - an inflammatory condition that can affect the blood vessels and cause nephritis, sinusitis, and hearing loss.
6. Sjogren's syndrome - a chronic autoimmune disease that affects the glands that produce tears and saliva, leading to dry mouth and kidney problems.
7. Sepsis - a severe infection that can cause nephritis, sinusitis, and fever.
8. Retinitis pigmentosa - a rare eye disease that can cause vision loss and night blindness.
9. Meniere's disease - a disorder of the inner ear that can cause hearing loss and tinnitus.
10. Post-transfusion nephrotoxicity - a rare but serious complication of blood transfusions that can cause kidney damage.
